meanings.definition: Extremely soft or gentle to the touch.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's fur was supersoft when I petted it.
meanings.sent2: The blanket felt supersoft against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The supersoft clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as supersoft as a whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The supersoft pillow provided a cloud-like comfort for my head.

meanings.definition: Very soft in texture or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The supersoft marshmallows melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent2: The supersoft fabric draped elegantly over the chair.
meanings.sent3: The supersoft ice cream melted too quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her supersoft hair flowed like silk in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The supersoft petals of the flower felt like velvet to the touch.
